metadata.name: Arachnophobia - No Spiders
metadata.description:
[h1]Introduction[/h1] Are you tired of fighting spider monsters or do you simply hate them? Then this is the mod for you!
[h1]Description[/h1] This mod [b][u]replaces[/u][/b] all spider monsters, bosses, familiars and items with equivalent ones. (Look in the mod's folder for the complete list).
[h1]Compatibility[/h1] [b]Repentance[/b] (tested) [b]Afterbirth+[/b] (not tested but it should work) [b]Mod Config Menu[/b] (you can disable/enable replacements for monsters & bosses, familiars, items).
